shayri.quote: Dil-e-naadaan tujhe hua kya hai, aakhir is dard ki dawa kya hai?
Woh khwab hi kya jo aankhon mein bas kar toot jaye.
Mohabbat mein nahi hai farq jeene aur marne ka.
Har kisi ko mukammal jahaan nahi milta.
Gulon mein rang bhare, baad-e-naubahar chale.
Kisi ke vaaste raahon mein kaante mat bichao, ho sakta hai kal aapko bhi wahan se guzarna pade.
Ranjish hi sahi, dil hi dukhane ke liye aa.
Dil dhoondta hai phir wahi fursat ke raat din.
Ibtidaa-e-ishq hai rota hai kya, aage aage dekhiye hota hai kya.
Hazaron khwahishein aisi ke har khwahish pe dam nikle.
Main akela hi chala tha janib-e-manzil magar, log saath aate gaye aur kaarvaan banta gaya.
Tum itna jo muskura rahe ho, kya gham hai jisko chhupa rahe ho?
Safar mein dhoop to hogi, jo chal sako to chalo.
Aansu bhi kabhi kabhi dil halka kar dete hain.
Tera naam le kar jee rahe hain, dard ko khushi keh rahe hain.
Dekh to dil ke jaan se uthta hai, yeh dhuaan sa kahaan se uthta hai.
Kabhi kisi ko mukammal jahaan nahi milta.
Bol ke lab azaad hain tere.
Ye na thi hamari qismat ke visal-e-yaar hota.
Suna hai log use aankh bhar ke dekhte hain.
